runs.comm: fuller in length, and on the stumps, defends it to leg side
short and wide outside off Jayasuriya leaves it alone
short in length, outside off, plays and misses
good length ball, on target, Tharanga pushes it to point
on the leg stump, turned down to fine leg for a single
fuller in length, outside off and moves away, Jayasuriya tries to push at it and is beaten all ends up

short and wide of the off stump, Jayasuriya cuts intentionally over the slips, in the air, Joyce jumping high at third man drops it, palms it over the rope, but that looks like a ankle that has gone as he lands on the one leg, going to be carted off the field
fuller in length, just outside off, drives it to deep cover for three runs, Bell the fielder there
short in length, pushed to point and Collingwood fumbles there and the batsmen take a quick single
slower ball, way outside off and rightly called a wide ball
again a slower ball, short in length, pitches outside leg, Jayasuriya tries to play it to the leg side, misses it, is hit on the pad, there's a shout for lbw, but its declined
fullish in length, on leg stump, turned away to fine leg, good diving save by Bresnan at the deep
fuller in length, just outside off and Thranga goes for the big shot down the ground, misses it completely, collected by Jones behind the stumps
Top shot! width outside off, Tharanga stands and delivers, drives it on the up between point and cover for four
MAXIMUM! short ball, this time Tharanga goes back and pulls it away over deep square leg fence for a six
good length ball, Tharanga comes down the wicket and tries to drive it, gets a thick outside edge to third man, take the first run quickly and comes back for the 2nd run
full toss, tries to drive it over mid-off, hits the toe of the bat and goes just short of mid-off, take another quick single
slower ball, on middle and leg stump, Jayasuriya gets right behind it and defends it to short midwicket
Tharanga lets it go past through to Jones
half volley, Tharanga defends it, its fielded by Plunkett on his follow through
full and on the legs, Tharanga drives through the on side, its Strauss this time who does the cleaning up
full toss on the stumps, Tharanga drives off the front foot
leg stump delivery, Jayasuriya plays at it, the ball comes off the pads and the batsmen take a legbye
what a hit by Sanath! its a noball, slightly short in length, he pulls it away over deep square leg for a six and a free hit is coming as well
slower ball, on middle stump, Jayasuriya goes well across and tries to sweep it over short fine leg, misses it, hits the gloves and goes to wide of keeper
good slower ball, on middle stump, Tharanga checks his shot and defends it back to bowler
short in length, pulled away to backwad square leg for a single
another slower ball, whipped away to long leg for a single again
fuller in length, on target, driven to cover, Jayasuriya went too far down the wicket searching for a quick single, Dalrymple has a shie at the stumps but misses the target
on middle and leg stump, turned to short midwicket
short in length, outside off, cuts it to deep point for a single
good shot! fuller in length, on middle stump, Tharanga gets across and sweeps it to beat the short fine leg fielder for four
slower ball, tries to repeat the shot, misses it and hits the pad well wide outside off, shout for lbw, Umpire declines and the batsmen rakes a legbye
on off stump, nudges it to point for a quick single
Collingwood strikes for England! slower ball, just outside off, Tharanga tries to drive it on the up, big inside edge crashes onto his leg stump
good line and length delivery, Jayawardene plays and misses

slower ball, on leg stump, Jayasuriya tries to play it on the leg side, comes off the pads to short fine leg, Jayawardene went far down the wicket to take a single, is sent back by Jayasuriya, Bell picks it up and throw it down to the bowler, Dalrymple whipped off the bails, TV Umpire called in, and Jayawardene has to walk back to the dressing room
pushed to point for a single

on off stump, pushed to cover and take off for a single, another quick return to Jones behind the stumps who whips off the bails, the bails are removed in a flash, TV Umpire called in again and Jayasuirya was just in
short in length, on leg stump, pulled away to deep midwicket for four
driven to deep cover for a single
arm ball, outside off, tries to play a late cut, gets beaten
on leg stump, tries to play it on the leg side, inside edge onto pads and goes to backward squrae leg
slower ball, fuller in length, outside off, tries to drive it and gets beaten
on off stump, driven to deep cover for a single
slower ball, on good length but wide of the off stump, Jayasuriya leaves it through to keeper

fuller in length, pitches just outside leg and was travelling further down the leg side, hits the pad, shout for lbw, up goes the finger of umpire, unlucky Jayasuriya has to walk back, Collingwood strikes again!
arm ball, Dilshan tries to cut one too close to his body, gets a thick outside edge  and Jones takes a good sharp catch behind the stumps, Sri Lanka 4 down now
short in length, pushed back to bowler, Dalrymple picked in his follow through and flicked the ball to hit the sumps, mised it, Sangakkara survived
on leg stump, Sangakkara goes for the sweep shot and beats the short fine leg fielder
outside off and guides it to gully
tossed up, on leg stump, lofted drive just wide of short midwicket and went in the gap between long-on and deep midwicket for four
fuller in length, on the off stump, driven back to bowler
slower ball, short in length, mistimes a cut to point, gets a single for that
fuller in length, outside off, driven down the ground to long-off for a single
slower ball, outside off, huge swing of the bat by Arnold, chips it over extra cover and comes back for the 2nd run
again full and wide outside off, goes inside out and drives it wide of long-off for couple more
slower ball, was down the leg side, Arnold tries the sweep shot but misses it, good take by Jones down the leg side, shout for caught behind, declined and called wide
good ball, fuller in length and swings in late, Arnold swings the bat across the line, he misses it and Collingwood hits!
fuller in length, outside off, driven to deep cover and came back for the 2nd run
short ball, on leg stump, pulled away to backward square leg for four
short and rising delivery outside off, Sangakkara leaves it through to keeper
slower ball, wide outside off, Sangakkara has a big heave at it, misses it, bad bounce in front of Jones and he fumbles a bit, the batsmen cross over for a bye
short in length, outside off, Kapugedera guides it to gully and takes a risky single, if Collingwood had hit the stumps direct on that occasion, Sangakkara would have been run out by some distance
short and wide outside off, goes for the cut shot and bottom edge on the bounce to keeper, takes a single
slower ball, on middle stump, Sangakkara chips it down the ground to long-on and comes back for the 2nd run
again on middle and leg stump, another lofted drive to long-on, falls well short of Plunkett there, take a single before he can throw the ball back to the bowler
slower ball, on middle and leg stump, pushed to mid-on and take a single
on middle and leg stump, slog swept to deep midwicket for a couple
another one for Collingwood, another low swinging full toss, this time on the leg stump, Sangakkara flicks it away in the air, straight to Strauss at short midwicket who makes no mistake with it
full ball, almost yorker length, digs it out to long-on
too quick for Maharoof, short and rising delivery, outside off, tries to cut it and gets beaten
fuller in length, on middle and leg stump, whipped away to deep midwicket for a couple
fuller in length, outside off, goes inside out and slices it to third man for a single
slower ball, way down the leg side
good low full toss, outside off, Kapugedera drives it to mid-off for a single
good length ball, outside off, drives it up and over extra cover and good chase by Bell and he saves a run on that occasion
on middle and leg stump, pushed to mid-on for a quick single
short in length, on leg stump, Kapugedera pulls it away to backward square leg for a couple, its Pietersen patrolling that region there
Great shot! fuller in length, on middle stump, he gives himself some room and drives it with the straight bat down the ground, that goes all the way over long-on for a six
good yorker, digs it out to mid-on

fuller in length, on leg stump, Maharoof pushes it to mid-on and takes off for a quick single, direct hit by fielder there and the TV umpire is called in again, replays show Maharoof was well short of crease, he has to walk back to the pavilion!
full delivery, nicely driven to long-on
full ball on the leg stump, driven down the ground to long-on for couple
slower ball, short in length, Kapugedera goes for the pull shot, comes off the gloves and takes a single as the ball rolls away to the gully region
good line and back of a length, Malinga leaves it alone
length ball, Malinga plays and misses
short in length, on leg stump, turned to fine leg for a single
good length and wide of the off stump, Kapugedera plays and misses
driven down the ground to long-n for couple
slower ball, on the leg stump again, heaved away to midwicket for another couple
fuller in length, on off stump, driven to long-off for a single
Kapugedera hits it into the leg side, noball for a fielding infringement - as a result, the following delivery won't be a freehit
short in length, on leg stump, turned to fine leg for a single
slower ball on good length, Kapugedera comes down the wicket and goes for the big heave, misses the line and gets beaten
Gone! fuller in length, outside off, Kapugedera goes inside out and drives it in the air to deep cover and Pietersen takes a good catch
short ball, Malinga pulls but can't make contact
fuller in length on leg stump, heaved away to midwicket fence for four
short ball, outside off and left alone
fuller in length, driven down the ground to long-off
short in length, mistimed pull by Malinga to deep midwicket and comes back for the 2nd run
short ball, goes for the pull shot, top edges it and Bell who is on the field for the injured Joyce takes a good catch
fuller in length, on leg stump, goes for the big heave, inside edge to keeper and Jones mised it

short ball, outside the off stump, Fernando tries the pull shot and gets beaten, tries to take a quick run, Jones is alert to the situation, collects the ball and throws it towards Plunkett who picks it up and hits the middle stump direct at bowling end - Fernando was no where near the crease. Sri Lanka finish their innings with a wicket off the last delivery!
